// Papa John's API Service
// Using TheMealDB (completely free, no CORS issues, working API)

const PAPA_JOHNS_CONFIG = {
  restaurant: {
    name: "Papa John's",
    description: "Better ingredients. Better pizza. Papa John's.",
    location: "Nairobi, Kenya",
    phone: "+254 700 000 000",
    website: "https://www.papajohns.co.ke",
    founded: "1984",
    branches: "5,500+",
    specialties: ["Fresh Dough", "Premium Toppings", "Signature Sauces"],
    rating: 4.4,
    deliveryTime: "25-35 min"
  }
};

// TheMealDB API (completely free, no CORS issues, working)
const THEMEALDB_API = {
  baseURL: 'https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1',
  endpoints: {
    search: '/search.php?s=',
    filter: '/filter.php?c=',
    random: '/random.php'
  }
};
export const papaJohnsAPI = {
  async getFullMenu() {
    try {
      console.log('üçï Fetching Papa John\'s menu from TheMealDB...');

      // Try to get real pizza data first
      const realMenu = await this.getRealPizzaMenu();
      if (realMenu && realMenu.length > 0) {
        console.log('‚úÖ Real pizza data loaded successfully');
        return {
          restaurant: PAPA_JOHNS_CONFIG.restaurant,
          menu: realMenu,
          promotions: this.getPromotions(),
          deals: this.getDeals(),
          rewards: this.getRewards(),
          customization: this.getCustomization(),
          locations: this.getLocations()
        };
      }
      console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è Using enhanced mock data as fallback');
      return this.getEnhancedMockMenu();
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('‚ùå Error fetching Papa John\'s menu:', error);
      return this.getEnhancedMockMenu();
    }
  },
  async getRealPizzaMenu() {
    try {
      console.log('üîç Fetching from TheMealDB API...');

      // Search for pizzas using the working endpoint
      const pizzaResponse = await fetch('https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/search.php?s=pizza');
      console.log('üì° Pizza API Response status:', pizzaResponse.status);
      if (!pizzaResponse.ok) {
        throw new Error(`Pizza API request failed: ${pizzaResponse.status}`);
      }
      const pizzaData = await pizzaResponse.json();
      console.log('‚úÖ Successfully fetched pizza data:', pizzaData);

      // Search for drinks
      const drinksResponse = await fetch('https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/filter.php?c=Cocktail');
      if (!drinksResponse.ok) {
        throw new Error(`Drinks API request failed: ${drinksResponse.status}`);
      }
      const drinksData = await drinksResponse.json();
      console.log('‚úÖ Successfully fetched drinks data:', drinksData);

      // Transform real data to our format
      const transformedMenu = [];

      // Add real pizzas
      if (pizzaData.meals && pizzaData.meals.length > 0) {
        console.log(`üçï Found ${pizzaData.meals.length} pizzas from API`);
        for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(pizzaData.meals.length, 10); i++) {
          var _pizza$strInstruction;
          const pizza = pizzaData.meals[i];
          console.log(`üçï Processing pizza ${i + 1}:`, pizza.strMeal);
          transformedMenu.push({
            id: `pizza-${pizza.idMeal}`,
            name: pizza.strMeal,
            description: ((_pizza$strInstruction = pizza.strInstructions) === null || _pizza$strInstruction === void 0 ? void 0 : _pizza$strInstruction.substring(0, 100)) + '...' || 'Delicious pizza made with fresh ingredients',
            price: this.generatePizzaPrice(),
            category: 'Pizzas',
            image: pizza.strMealThumb || '/images/food/placeholder-food.jpg',
            calories: Math.floor(Math.random() * 300) + 200,
            serves: '1 person',
            preparationTime: '20-25 min',
            isPromo: Math.random() > 0.7,
            promoText: 'Hot Deal!',
            signature: Math.random() > 0.8,
            size: ['Small', 'Medium', 'Large'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)],
            crust: ['Classic', 'Thin', 'Stuffed', 'Pan'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 4)],
            tags: ['Fresh', 'Cheese', 'Tomato'],
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy'],
            spiceLevel: 'None'
          });
        }
      } else {
        console.warn('‚ö†Ô∏è No pizza data found in API response');
      }

      // Add real drinks
      if (drinksData.meals && drinksData.meals.length > 0) {
        console.log(`ü•§ Found ${drinksData.meals.length} drinks from API`);
        for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(drinksData.meals.length, 8); i++) {
          const drink = drinksData.meals[i];
          console.log(`ü•§ Processing drink ${i + 1}:`, drink.strMeal);
          transformedMenu.push({
            id: `drink-${drink.idMeal}`,
            name: drink.strMeal,
            description: 'Refreshing beverage to complement your meal',
            price: this.generateDrinkPrice(),
            category: 'Beverages',
            image: drink.strMealThumb || '/images/food/placeholder-food.jpg',
            calories: Math.floor(Math.random() * 150) + 50,
            serves: '1 person',
            preparationTime: '5 min',
            isPromo: Math.random() > 0.8,
            promoText: 'Happy Hour!',
            tags: ['Refreshing', 'Cold'],
            allergens: [],
            spiceLevel: 'None'
          });
        }
      } else {
        console.warn('‚ö†Ô∏è No drinks data found in API response');
      }

      // Add some mock sides and desserts to complete the menu
      transformedMenu.push(...this.getMockSidesAndDesserts());
      console.log(`‚úÖ Successfully transformed ${transformedMenu.length} menu items`);
      return transformedMenu;
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('‚ùå Error fetching real pizza data:', error);
      console.log('üîÑ Falling back to mock data...');
      return null;
    }
  },
  generatePizzaPrice() {

  transformDirectMenuData(data) {
    // Transform direct API data to our format
    return {

  transformJumiaMenuData(data) {

    return {
      restaurant: PAPA_JOHNS_CONFIG,
      categories: this.groupByCategory(data.menu || []),
      promotions: data.promotions || [],
      deliveryInfo: {

      },

      deals: data.deals || [],
      rewards: data.rewards || {},
      customization: data.customization || {}
    };
  },
  transformGlovoMenuData(data) {
    // Transform Glovo data to our format
    return {

      categories: this.groupByCategory(data.menu || []),
      promotions: data.promotions || [],
      deliveryInfo: {
        available: true,
        services: ['Glovo'],

        deliveryFee: data.deliveryFee || 'KES 150',
        minimumOrder: data.minimumOrder || 'KES 800'
      },
      locations: data.locations || [],
      deals: data.deals || [],
      rewards: data.rewards || {},
      customization: data.customization || {}
    };
  },
  groupByCategory(menuItems) {
    // Group menu items by category
    const categories = {};
    menuItems.forEach(item => {
      if (!categories[item.category]) {
        categories[item.category] = [];
      }
      categories[item.category].push(item);
    });
    return categories;
  },
